name: Calligraphy Tops
description:
Bayt Ul Haya now presents the beautiful calligraphy tops. 

Wear it for a special occasion or simply for a day out we assure you, you will not only stand out but look modest and chic.

Please note- the arabic text does not mean anything they are simply scrambled letters to give you the design it does.

name: Grey Arabic Abaya
description:
Bayt Ul Haya Presents Arabic Text Abaya, Something Modest yet fashionable. TO give you the elegant and unique look.

*Email us at baytulhaya@hotmail.com with your size preference and order number for us to ship your order after your purchase* 


-Jersey Material 
-Scarf Attached to the Abaya (inc Arabic text on scarf) 
-With inner belt to adjust fitting as you wish

Note - the Arabic text does not have a meaning to it, they are random Arabic alphabets just put in mixed forms to give you the look it presents.

name: The Mist 'Farasha Abaya'
description:
Bayt Ul Haya presents The Mist Farasha Abaya, with a beautiful flow, made from Jersey material.

Our design team created a unique piece just for you, with teal and silver crystals perfect for an evening or a party wear.

*Email us at baytulhaya@hotmail.com with your size preference and order number for us to ship your order after your purchase*

description:

PLEASE NOTE- 
The Arabic letters do not mean anything they are just a mix of the arabic letters to present you with the look that it does

name: Purple Love
description:

The brick wall print is perfect to give you the vintage yet chic look.
